title: Graphic Designer (Ecommerce/DTC)
job_overview:
We are a dynamic company in the Health & Wellness sector, dedicated to enhancing the lives of our customers through innovative fitness and sports equipment. We are seeking a talented freelancer who is passionate about their craft and has a proven track record in performance-focused direct-to-consumer (DTC) work.

**Role Details:**

- **Language:** English
- **Availability:** 30-40 hours/week
- **Time Zone:** CET
- **Work Type:** Freelancer
- **Niche:** Health & Wellness, Fitness & Sports Equipment
- **Payment (Negotiable):** $0 - 1000, $Upgrade to see actual info**Responsibilities:**

- Deliver results at scale with a strong track record of success.
- Collaborate with recognizable brands to create impactful designs.
- Develop engaging static and animated graphics that resonate with the target audience.
- Utilize design skills to enhance marketing materials and campaigns.

**Must-Haves:**

- Proven experience in delivering results for recognizable brands.
- Strong skills in static and animated graphic design.
- Ability to work independently and proactively in a remote setting.
- Familiarity with performance-focused DTC strategies.

**Nice to Haves:**

- Interest in health and wellness trends.
- Experience with social media marketing and content creation.
- Knowledge of user experience (UX) design principles.
- Familiarity with fitness and sports equipment markets.
